MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY14 postcode area of Cupar. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have restored some supplies by switching the network remotely from our control centre. We have now found faulty equipment on our overhead line network and we now expect your supply to be restored by 12:45pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 07:41am on the 4th of December 2020.
